mapper.select: select sp.id, sp.member_id, sp.experience_program_id, sp.scrap_status, sp.created_datetime, sp.updated_datetime, ep.experience_program_title, ep.experience_program_deadline, ep.experience_program_status, ep.corp_id from tbl_scrap_posting sp join tbl_experience_program ep on sp.experience_program_id = ep.id where sp.member_id = #{memberId} and sp.scrap_status = 'active' order by sp.created_datetime desc
mapper.update: update tbl_scrap_posting set scrap_status = #{scrapStatus}, updated_datetime = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
